content: **pattern introduction** flowers create a welcoming cheerful space and why not add a little of that welcoming cheer into our cleaning the flower power scrub combines the strength of scrubbing with the softness of flowers thus bringing harmony and joy to your scrubbing routine flower power scrub is knit flat using short row to create each petal of your flower once seamed together your fun flower power scrub is ready to use **skills** this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable with or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques bind-off long tail cast-on kitchener stitch knitting short row wrap and turn not familiar with these techniques no problem the pattern includes links to helpful tutorial videos to guide you every step of the way **materials** **yarn recommendations** loops & threads squeaky clean fiber content polyester 100% 92 yards/85 meters 3 5 oz/100 g or similar yarn that knits to gauge **sample used** 11 22 30 yards/10 20 27 meters 0 4 0 8 1 1 oz/12 23 32 g 1 ball small and large in cupid and medium in candy colorway **knitting needles** us size 8/5 mm or size used to match gauge - straight or circular as you prefer **notions** locking stitch marker scissors tapestry needle **size information** s m l **finished measurements** 4 25 6 7 5 inches/11 15 5 19 cm in diameter 1 https //www ozzylosiknitdesigns com/summer-of-scrubbies-2025/
